wikipedia_page.main: Ruth Gilfillan (born 6 March 1967) is a British swimmer. Gilfillan competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. She won the 1987 and 1991 ASA National Championship 200 metres freestyle titles  and the 1987, 1988 and 1991 ASA National Championship 400 metres freestyle titles.
